title: 1331Fox’s Greg Gutfeld is going viral after absolutely demolishing leftist NYT podcaster David March
content:
1331 Fox’s Greg Gutfeld is going viral after absolutely demolishing leftist NYT podcaster David Marchese after he complained about Planned Parenthood clinics receiving mean letters from pro-life activists, with Gutfeld responding, “Well, I mean, they are killing children." posted 4 days ago by Mr_Rightside 81 comments award share report block Right Angle News Network @Rightanglenews • 4d BREAKING - Fox’s Greg Gutfeld is going viral after absolutely demolishing leftist NYT podcaster David Marchese after he complained about Planned Parenthood clinics receiving mean letters from pro-life activists, with Gutfeld responding, “Well, I mean, they are killing kids.”
81 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web 23 Ridiculously Cool Gadgets You'll Want to Buy Immediately Trending Gadget Than0sIII 77 points 4 days ago It's so fucking frustrating that we somehow got to this point where they're literally killing unborn children who have no say in the matter, and somehow it's not treated as morally reprehensible as it should always be. permalink award report block reply _Sully_ 38 points 4 days ago Because you are trying to convince evil to be good. When they are evil because its easy. Like trying to convince an addict that getting high doesn't feel good. It absolutely does. That's why they do it. permalink parent award report block reply NewGoldenAge 21 points 4 days ago After they shot Charlie - it's like we should exterminate vermin and evil from the face of the Earth. Go for it. There was also that long-serving Republican Congressman Tim Murphy who persuaded his mistress into having an abortion. He resigned in 2017 and, by doing so, gave Democrats another seat in the House of Representatives. permalink parent award report block reply Dangerous 9 points 4 days ago Weak men follow what women approve of.
